BMSS.standardfiles_generators package¶

Submodules¶

BMSS.standardfiles_generators.sbmlgen module¶

This module contains functions to generate SBML standard files.

Features: -to generate SBML .xml files from a list of configuration files -to generate SBML files from model database -to autogenerate SBML .xml files for all configuration files contained inside a folder path

BMSS.standardfiles_generators.sbmlgen.SBMLcreation(core_model, settings, unit_model, addparam, j, k)¶
BMSS.standardfiles_generators.sbmlgen.autogenerate_sbml_from_folder(folderpath)¶

To automatically generate the corresponding SBML files from the given folder containing all the configuration files.

Parameters

folderpath (str) – the path to the folder containing all the configuration files.

BMSS.standardfiles_generators.sbmlgen.config_to_sbml(inifileslist)¶

Read in list of configuration files and generate the corresponding SBML files.

Parameters

inifileslist (list) – a list of input configuration files in strings.

BMSS.standardfiles_generators.sbmlgen.database_to_sbml(system_type, settings_name)¶

Select model stored in database and generate the SBML file.

BMSS.standardfiles_generators.sbmlgen.unitlookup(settings)¶
